author: smuzaffar
body:
These fixes are needed to avoid exposing private headers files (files in non-interface directory of package) via public interface files
- `RecoLocalMuon/RPCRecHit`: It generates a plugin so all files from `interface/src` are moved to plugins directory
- `RecoLocalCalo/HcalRecAlgos`:
  - `src/HybridMinimizer.h` is needed by `interface/PulseShapeFitOOTPileupCorrection.h`
- `RecoPixelVertexing/PixelTriplets`:
  - `src/CACut.h`  and `src/CAGraph.h` are used by headers in `interface` direcotry. So move these to `interface` too
title: [Reco] Fixes needed to avoid exposing private headers via interface dir
